attributes.additional_details: the first bus services are hurrendous, they never arrive on time, sometimes they just drive past you ignoring you. the drivers are usually in a bad mood and if you question them why they were late you get abuse rather than an apology. I am creating this e-petition to get as many signatures as possible to get the government to fix this problem. we are meant to be creating less pollution, with the buses so unreliable more and more people are getting cars.
